meanings.sent1: I love the different typefaces used in the book.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often spend time choosing the perfect typefaces for their projects.
meanings.sent3: The typefaces on the menu made the restaurant look very fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was like a mix of different typefaces, each telling a unique story.
meanings.sent5: The typefaces on the sign were so bold and clear, you couldn't miss them.

meanings.definition: A set of one or more fonts.
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer selected a variety of typefaces for the project.
meanings.sent2: Different typefaces can completely change the look and feel of a document.
meanings.sent3: The typefaces in the library were having a party, each one trying to outshine the others.
meanings.sent4: The typefaces in her collection were like a family, each with its own personality.
meanings.sent5: The typefaces on the website were so elegant, they added a touch of sophistication.
